name: Copyright Wars 2055
description:
Here's a sample from the game:

Welcome to the future...

As technology has advanced so has the speed of the internet and maximum capacity of hard drives.

Piracy has never been easier, with a click of a button you can download every song, movie and game ever made.

The concerns over companies losing profit to bootleggers has now pushed towards the edge of breaking point.

Governments of the world by this point has became totally corrupt and is only interested in the profits from the mega-companies that support the economy. There are very few companies left, just the big major players. No room for the middleman, the middle class is non-existent now and america’s dream died with it.

-A short story in graphic novel format
